sentences.en: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.cn: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.en: at 3–0 up they should have been home and dry.
sentences.cn: 以3比0领先的情况下他们本来应该取胜的。

sentences.en: at home in diplomatic circles.
sentences.cn: 在外交场合轻松自如

sentences.en: at home in French.
sentences.cn: 对法语运用自如

sentences.en: at home on Thursdays.
sentences.cn: 周四可待客

sentences.en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
sentences.cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

sentences.en: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.cn: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.en: He died in a nursing home at the age of 87.
sentences.cn: 他在一家养老院去世，享年87岁。

sentences.en: her first-hand account brought home to me the pain of the experience.
sentences.cn: 她的第一手叙述使我真切地感受到那种经历的痛苦。

sentences.en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentences.cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: I always feel at home at Ye Olde Starre Inn.
sentences.cn: 在昨日星辰客栈，我总有种宾至如归的感觉。

sentences.en: I had to postpone ideas of a career and stay at home.
sentences.cn: 我不得不暂缓就业打算，呆在家里。

sentences.en: I told him he wasn't welcome in my home.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他我家不欢迎他。

sentences.en: I’m going home now. See you tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我现在要回家了，明天见。

sentences.en: Is Sue home from work yet?
sentences.cn: 休下班回到家了吗？

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Poland provide the opposition for the Scots' last warm-up match at home.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在国内最后一场热身赛的对手是波兰队。

sentences.en: She had stopped nagging him about never being home.
sentences.cn: 她不再不停地指责他总不在家了。

sentences.en: The children were waiting for placement in a foster care home.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子在抚育院等待安置。

sentences.en: the couple set up home in Chelsea eight years ago.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇八年前在切尔西定居。

sentences.en: the full enormity of what was happening came home to Sara.
sentences.cn: 萨拉完全意识到了正在发生的一切暴行。

sentences.en: The Home Secretary is considering a new law against stalking.
sentences.cn: 内务大臣正考虑制定一项针对跟踪骚扰的新法律。

sentences.en: These children need a proper home life .
sentences.cn: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

sentences.en: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

sentences.en: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.cn: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.en: We encountered the pathetic sight of a family packing up its home.
sentences.cn: 我们目睹了一家人正在收拾家当准备离开的凄惨景象。

sentences.en: We stayed home last night.
sentences.cn: 我们昨晚待在家里。

sentences.en: We're going to go home and nurse our colds.
sentences.cn: 我们打算回家调养感冒。

sentences.en: What other home offers such a commanding view of the capital?
sentences.cn: 还有其他的房子能像这幢一样俯瞰首都吗？

sentences.en: who's Peter when he's at home?.
sentences.cn: 那位彼得是何许人也？。

words.tran_cn: 舒适的，自在的；如在家的
家庭的；平凡的；不好看的
舒适的；家庭似的；自在的
回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的
喜欢在家消遣的男人；家庭第一主义的男人

phrases.tran_cn: 可以胜任的，熟练自如的
（言词，论题）令人不快；令人尴尬
(高尔夫)打后九穴。 比较 go out（见 go）
（事情的重要性）已完全被人意识到

phrases.phrase: drive (或 hammer 或 press 或 ram) something home
phrases.tran_cn: （通过反复、直白的论述来）清楚有力地表达
在家中般轻松自在；感觉自在
（拳头，导弹）击中目标，命中目标

phrases.phrase: home is where the heart is
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)心之所在即为家；金窝银窝，不如自家的狗窝
（用于表达在家里或回家后的喜悦和放松的心情）在家真好；幸亏在家；终于到家了

phrases.phrase: home, James (and don't spare the horses)!
phrases.tran_cn: (旧)［催促驾驶员的幽默用 语］快点儿，老兄（别心疼马呀）！
(英)（用于询问某人身份时加强幽默语气）…是何许人也

trans.tran_cn: 家庭的，家用的，本地的，本部的
trans.tran_en: relating to or belonging to your home or family

trans.tran_cn: 在家，在家乡，深深地，深入地
trans.tran_en: to or at the place where you live
the house, apartment, or place where you live
to or at the place where you live
